# Robot Docs

> Workstation setup documentation for robotics simulation and development with Isaac Sim, Isaac ROS, and Unitree G1.

## Getting Started

- [Quick Start](getting-started/index.md): Introduction to the system -- what everything is, how it connects, and where to go next.
- [Architecture](getting-started/architecture.md): System architecture diagrams for simulation and real G1 robot modes, data flow, DDS config.

## Guides

- [Isaac Sim Setup](guides/isaac-sim-setup.md): Isaac Sim 5.1 and Isaac Lab installation, ROS 2 bridge, Foxglove visualization, troubleshooting.
- [Isaac ROS Container](guides/isaac-ros-container.md): GPU-accelerated ROS 2 perception container (AprilTag, cuVSLAM, nvblox), FastDDS config, foxglove-bridge.
- [GPU & Display Config](guides/gpu-and-display.md): NVIDIA persistence mode, X11 virtual display, xorg.conf, EDID generator, DPMS settings.
- [Sunshine Streaming](guides/sunshine-streaming.md): Sunshine game streaming server for remote desktop via Moonlight.
- [Tailscale Setup](guides/tailscale-setup.md): Tailscale VPN ACL policy, peer relay setup, connection priority.
- [NAT Troubleshooting](guides/nat-troubleshooting.md): NAT concepts (EIM/EDM, EIF/EDF), CGNAT, STUN, UPnP, troubleshooting commands.

## Reference

- [Hardware & Specs](reference/hardware.md): RTX 3090 workstation specs, NVIDIA driver, GPU requirements for Isaac Sim.
- [Network Topology](reference/network-topology.md): Toronto/Kingston network layout, Tailscale devices, throughput benchmarks.
- [Current Setup](reference/current-setup.md): Software versions snapshot (Feb 2026) -- Isaac Sim 5.1, Isaac Lab 2.3.2, Docker, CUDA 13.0.
- [Isaac ROS Dockerfile](reference/isaac-ros-dockerfile.md): Reproducible Dockerfile plan for the Isaac ROS container.

## Project

- [Progress](project/progress.md): Current work in progress and next steps.
- [About](project/about.md): How this documentation site is built.
